[gun1] recognizes this half of a face, and she's not the only one to do so. It is once one of the most famous faces in the world, after all, which is also why she's got only half a face left.

[gun1] rubs her eyes, unsure if the familiar blue telephone booth before her is an illusion, as it seems to appear everywhere, yet nothing out of the ordinary is found after an inspection of the booth.

[gun1] notices a glowing red, outdated-looking rocket beside a gas station. In the gas station also resides a diner, and she guesses that human astronauts of the past used to come here to eat and refuel before continuing on their short-lived space travels.
If the police officer did not oversleep, then he might've been able to stop the end of the world with this police cruiser, thought [gun1] as she looks on the wreckage of the car.
[gun1] tries to connect with the strange terminal interface on the ground but fails. If she did succeed, would she encounter an AI? Would it tell her where the lost research base is?
[gun1] discovers an entrance to a huge underground subway system. If it hasn't collapsed inside, perhaps there's enough space to support many generations if the world ever comes to an end.

[gun1] unexpectedly finds a cube half buried in the ground. Even if it isn't alive and doesn't have a mouth it can still be a companion to a human, yet humans will choose to euthanize it. I guess that is just what humans are.
[gun1] comes across a strange statue, and in light of its strange shape, the group decides to take a photo with it and affectionately name it the "Golden Ducktail".
[gun1] looks at the golden statue placed out here, imagining this flame to be a past representation of the human desire for prosperity. However, the others sneer at this interpretation.
[gun1] finds a wreckage of a strange, old vehicle. The design looks so advanced that nobody could believe it came from half a century ago.

The T-Dolls come up against a group of enemies.
Judging them to be very weak, the group decides to fight.
The enemies are dealt with swiftly, and the group gets a boost in morale, and they happily continue on with their journey.

The T-Dolls detect a large number of enemies to the front.
For the sake of saving strength, the group decides to avoid a head-on fight.
The enemies arrogantly saunter while the T-Dolls conceal themselves and wait for the enemies to leave before heading on.

The T-Dolls come up against a group of strong enemies.
In light of the difference in strength, the group decides to retreat.
The enemies chase in pursuit but the group is able to break away, successfully avoiding a tough fight.

The T-Dolls come up against a BOSS leading a powerful group of enemies.
They engage the BOSS following its provocation.
The enemies drop like flies and the BOSS flees in terror, and the group happily continues on with their journey.
